org.resthub.identity.model

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.identity.model.AbstractPermissionsOwner
      • org.resthub.identity.model.Group

  • @Entity
@Indexed
public class Group
extends AbstractPermissionsOwner
    Describes a group.
    A group has few attributes, a name, a list of User belonging to this Group and some permissions
